name: Trigger Finger Trivia
description:
Click! Draw! Bang! Pow! Welcome to the world of Trigger Finger Trivia. Four thugs compete to outdraw each other and be titled the quickest draw. Compete with three friends, answer trivia questions, and see who will be crowned the quickest draw.

Trigger Finger Trivia is a game made to play with friends. Four people will compete by embodying a western thug, Cowboy Carlos, Dastardly Dave, Bandit Betty, and Prospector Pete. Two Players will be pinned against each other in a quick draw competition. They will use their trigger word to “Shoot First” and answer the proposed trivia question. A correct answer will take a life from your competitor but a get the answer wrong and lose a life. Each player will start with 5 lives. The last player standing wins. Click! Draw! Bang! Pow! Shoot quick and test your wit.
